lead_paragraph: As the Feb. 1 caucuses approach, people in the state’s smaller towns want to see him spend more time among them making personal connections.

byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and TRIP GABRIEL

snippet: As the Feb. 1 caucuses approach, people in the state’s smaller towns want to see him spend more time among them making personal connections.

headline.main: Marco Rubio’s Iowa Supporters Beg Him: Come Visit. Often.
headline.print_headline: Rubio Supporters in Iowa’s Small Towns Beg: Come Visit. Often.

abstract: Many of Sen Marco Rubio's supporters in Iowa are urging him to hold more campaign events in state, which is standard practice for any candidate who wishes to do well in caucuses; Rubio's unorthodox Iowa strategy and his emphasis on keeping expectations low about his performance in caucuses raises questions about whether he actually hopes to win in Iowa.
